document_data.caption: The Bowels's interior.
document_data.name: Bowels of the Earth
document_data.mainbody: The '''Bowels of the Earth''' was a [[tavern]] located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The tavern stood two stories tall.
document_data.Location:
[[File:VirginsSquareIA.png|thumb|''A map showing the Bowels of the Earth (labeled #198) on Simple's Street.''|320x320px]]
The Bowels of the Earth was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] on the southeast corner of where [[Simple's Street]] joined [[Snail Street]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Dead Trades Ward}}
document_data.Services: The tavern was a well-known spot for hiring [[mercenaries]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The Bowels of the Earth was owned by [[Blazidon One-Eye]] in the {{YearlinkName|1372}}.
